__e: What with Dexter's mother and everything.
You've been in this situation before, Dexter, and I don't need to tell you how it ended...
Dexter is happy..... and I know him well enough to understand... that this is a pretty big deal.
Your buddy, Dexter Morgan - you asked me to keep an eye on him.
What I remember, Dexter Morgan, is your father caring enough to bring you into his home and give you a loving family.
I tried every avenue, legal and otherwise, but there ain't no paper trail on the early years of Dexter Morgan.
I'm telling you - - Dexter is not Who you think he is.
Oh, fuck, Dexter, I don't know if this was the right thing to do.
But Dexter can't help what he is.
